categories: Category:Imperial Navy admirals of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Poteet was a Sector Admiral who served in the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War. In 0 BBY, he sent the librarian droid P-RC3 to the Death Star Library for duty, where the droid worked under Commander Atour Riten.
Poteet was first mentioned in the 2007 novel Death Star by Michael Reaves and Steve Perry.
